title: CM Bugti hails Arshad Nadeem as ‘Brave & Talented’ after Olympic Gold Win
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 9 (APP): Balochistan Chief Minister (CM) Sarfaraz Bugti Friday extended warm congratulations to Pakistani athlete Arshad Nadeem on his outstanding achievement of winning a gold medal at the Olympics and called him a “brave and talented young athlete”.
In his message on the PTV News, Bugti expressed his pride and joy at Arshad Nadeem’s historic win, saying it was a momentous occasion for the entire nation. He praised Nadeem’s dedication, hard work, and perseverance, which he said were an inspiration to young athletes across Pakistan.
The CM said that Pakistan has many talented young people and Nadeem’s success shows the country’s potential. Sarfaraz Bugti expressed his best wishes For Arshad Nadeem’s further success as well.
He expressed hope that Nadeem’s achievement would motivate others to strive for excellence in their respective fields. He said Nadeem’s gold medal win had brought immense pride and honor to Pakistan, and his name would be remembered in the annals of history.
